title: How Nigeria constitution reduces ethnic cleavages

content.prompt: In its effort to reduce the problem of ethnonationalism, the 1999 Nigerian Constitution

choices.label: abolished the quota system for bureaucratic recruitment
adopted the three major Nigerian languages as official languages
encouraged families to adopt children from regions other than their own
encouraged the formation of ethnically neutral political parties

topic.text: 3.9: Challenges from Political and Social Cleavages

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
